# React ERP Dashboard Project

## Project Type
React application with Vite, featuring a modern ERP dashboard for manufacturing/stock management.

## Technology Stack
- React 18
- Vite
- Tailwind CSS
- Lucide React (icons)

## Project Structure
- Modern SAAS-style interface
- Left sidebar navigation
- Top navbar with search and notifications
- Main dashboard with widgets
- Stock alert notification system with modal
